issues.description: In the solution for fix_vec_sub.asm the module declares `extern fix_vec_sub_asm` instead of exporting it (via `global fix_vec_sub_asm`) as in the template. This mismatch means the symbol is not exported in the solution file, conflicting with the template and preventing correct linkage.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm replace `extern fix_vec_sub_asm` with `global fix_vec_sub_asm` so that the function is correctly exported, matching the template and enabling linkage.
